description: French student in engineering and physics, passionate about programming, climbing and AI

Self-taught Machine Learning
home.introduction: My name is ThÃ©o, I am currently studying at ENSTA Paris, a French Ivy League school. I've always been drawn to science and technology, thus I wish to participate to the creation of various and innovative projects. On my free time, I develop small projects and climb, among other occupations. Feel free to contact me for any piece of information, or simply talk!

ensta.name: Engineering Curricula â€’ ENSTA Paris
ensta.text:
ENSTA Paris, founder member of Institute Polytechnique of Paris, ranked 2nd school in the French Ivy League and First in environment, teaches courses in various scientific fields for strategic areas : sustainable mobility, energy, defense.

I take part in varied associations :
  • TAEP, the Junior-Enterprise of ENSTA Paris : we carry out missions for companies in the ENSTA area of expertise : applied mathematics, mechanics, computer science
  • Forum ASTER : yearly meeting between IP Paris students and environmentally engaged corporations
  • Computer Science : web infrastructure maintenance for school associations, web development training

parc.name: High-intensity preparatory class â€’ LycÃ©e du Parc, Lyon
parc.text:
Classes designed to prepare students for prestigious schools (French Ivy League) â€’ Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science
Distinction

carriat.name: High school diploma
carriat.text:
Mathematics, Engineering Science, Physics
Distinction, with summa cum laude

taep.name: Business Development Manager â€’ TAEP, the Junior-Enterprise of ENSTA Paris
taep.text:
TAEP calls on highly-qualified ENSTA students to carry out missions for companies in applied mathematics (optimisation, forecast), mechanics (design, simulation, sizing) and computer sciences (web and software development, AI, data science, cybersecurity).

As Business Development Manager, on top of missions monitoring and companies support, I manage a team of seven people to realize projects for the structure : events, communication, partnerships.

To learn more, visit www.taep.fr !

areas.name: Seasonal work â€’ Motorway rest area
areas.text: Versatile employee : barista and seller in a coffee shop â€’ receptionist at the hotel â€’ shelf restocking â€’ cleaning

code.name: Programming
code.description: I have had a passion for computing for a long time, and I create my own applications and websites since I'm twelve (2016) to put my ideas into practice without being dependent on others or inflexible tools. Since 2018, I publish some of them on Github to share my creations and open them to everyone's contribution. I have learnt OCaml and C in preparatory class, Javascript, Python, Ruby and Go by self-taught, and I use Jetbrains IDE on Linux.

climbing.name: Climbing
climbing.description: Since joining a club in 2018, I've enjoyed climbing routes and bouldering, indoor or outdoor, to challenge myself and clear my head. I complete this practice with various sport (weight training, cardio, mountain biking) so that I'm always in shape to progress.

cubing.name: Twisty puzzles
cubing.description: I have learnt to solve the Rubik's Cube then various algorithms so I can solve it as fast as I can (Speed Cubing field), then I did the same with other puzzles. My ambition is to eventually participate at competitions, friendly exchange moments on this wide subject. From now on I solve puzzles without assistance to deeply understand their mechanism arouse my curiosity.

highest.name: Highest
highest.description: At the crossroads of my passions for IT and climbing, this specific tool for climbers serves to organize one's routes, their progression on it and their goals. QR-Codes can be printed in climbing gyms for a fast addition.

bop.name: BecauseOfProg
bop.description: The BecauseOfProg is a team founded in 2017 by myself and two friends to create together and share our discoveries on IT, digital and programming. We are also maintaining a small community on our Discord server.

mapping.name: 3D Mapping
mapping.description: A 3D-printed platform and equipped with a LiDAR sensor to model a room. Live-transmitted scan on a website and options to perform calculations and surface rebuilding.

tipe.name: Earthquake reconnaissance drone
tipe.description: Trajectory planification algorithms for drones so they can explore zones devastated by an earthquake, taking into account topography and population density. The goal was to realise an efficient scan as fast as possible so emergency services on ground are relieved, and precious data on the condition of the premises and the people to be rescued is transmitted to them.
